name: embedded-device-logger
description: Stream and filter embedded Linux device logs over SSH inside VS Code.
author: A. Scillato

embeddedLogger.defaultPort.description: Default SSH port applied to devices that do not specify one.

embeddedLogger.defaultLogCommand.description: Default log command used when a device omits logCommand.

embeddedLogger.defaultEnableSshTerminal.description: Whether devices without an explicit enableSshTerminal flag should show the SSH terminal action.

embeddedLogger.defaultEnableSftpExplorer.description: Whether devices without an explicit enableSftpExplorer flag should show the SFTP explorer action.

embeddedLogger.defaultEnableWebBrowser.description: Whether devices without an explicit enableWebBrowser flag should show the web browser action.

embeddedLogger.defaultSshCommands.description: Reusable SSH commands automatically applied to devices that do not define their own list.
embeddedLogger.defaultSshCommands.markdownDescription:
Reusable SSH commands automatically applied to devices that do not define their own list.

Example:
```json
[
  { "name": "Reboot", "command": "sudo reboot" },
  { "name": "Restart service", "command": "systemctl restart app.service" }
]
```

name.description: Display name for the SSH command.

embeddedLogger.devices.description: List of embedded devices to stream logs from.
embeddedLogger.devices.markdownDescription:
List of embedded devices to stream logs from.

Example:
```json
[
  {
    "id": "rpi4",
    "name": "Raspberry Pi 4",
    "host": "192.168.1.50",
    "hostFingerprint": "SHA256:your-base64-fingerprint",
    "secondaryHost": "192.168.1.51",
    "secondaryHostFingerprint": "SHA256:secondary-base64-fingerprint",
    "port": 22,
    "username": "pi",
    "privateKeyPath": "/home/user/.ssh/id_ed25519",
    "privateKeyPassphrase": "${env:KEY_PASSPHRASE}",
    "logCommand": "journalctl -f -u app.service",
    "enableSshTerminal": true,
    "enableSftpExplorer": true,
    "enableWebBrowser": false,
    "webBrowserUrl": "http://192.168.1.50",
    "sshCommands": [
      { "name": "Reboot", "command": "sudo reboot" }
    ]
  }
]
```

name.description: Friendly name shown in the sidebar.

hostFingerprint.description: SHA256 fingerprint of the device's SSH host key (for example, output of ssh-keygen -lf -E sha256).

secondaryHost.description: Optional fallback hostname or IP address to try when the primary host is unavailable.

secondaryHostFingerprint.description: SHA256 fingerprint of the fallback host's SSH key.

bastion.description: Optional bastion/jump host to reach the device through.

host.description: Hostname or IP address of the bastion host.

hostFingerprint.description: SHA256 fingerprint of the bastion host's SSH key.

port.description: SSH port for the bastion host.

username.description: SSH username for the bastion host.

password.description: Legacy password field for the bastion; stored to secret storage on first use.

privateKeyPath.description: Path to an SSH private key for the bastion host.

privateKeyPassphrase.description: Legacy passphrase field for bastion keys; stored to secret storage on first use.

password.description: Legacy password field; stored to secret storage on first use.

privateKeyPath.description: Path to an SSH private key to authenticate with instead of a password.
privateKeyPath.markdownDescription:
Path to an SSH private key to authenticate with instead of a password.

Examples:
- `/home/user/.ssh/id_ed25519`
- `${env:HOME}/.ssh/id_rsa`

privateKeyPassphrase.description: Legacy passphrase field for encrypted keys; stored to secret storage on first use.

logCommand.description: Command to stream logs (defaults to tail -F /var/log/syslog).

enableSshTerminal.description: Whether to show an Open SSH Terminal action for this device.

enableSftpExplorer.description: Whether to show an Open SFTP Explorer action for this device.

enableWebBrowser.description: Whether to show an Open WEB Browser action for this device.

webBrowserUrl.description: Optional URL to open for the device; defaults to http://<host> when omitted.

sshCommands.description: Optional list of on-demand SSH commands available from the Devices view.

name.description: Display name for the SSH command.

embeddedLogger.maxLinesPerTab.description: Maximum number of log lines retained per log tab before older lines are discarded.
